original_text: For the cloud of the Lord was on the tabernacle by day, and fire was in it by night, in the sight of all the house of Israel throughout all their journeys.
korean_text: 낮에는 여호와의 구름이 성막 위에 있고 밤에는 불이 그 구름 가운데에 있음을 이스라엘의 온 족속이 그 모든 행진하는 길에서 그들의 눈으로 보았더라

sentences.original_text: For the cloud of the Lord was on the tabernacle by day
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 구름은 낮에 성막 위에 있었고

sentences.original_text: and fire was in it by night
in the sight of all the house of Israel
